title: 즉흥 토론
description: 즉흥적인 토론 상황에서 논리적이고 설득력 있는 발언을 위한 표현들을 연습합니다.
examples: That's an interesting point, but I'd like to counter with this observation.
While I respect your perspective, the evidence seems to suggest otherwise.
Building on what you just said, I think we should also consider this angle.
learning_points: 즉흥 토론에서의 논리적이고 설득력 있는 발언 기술

sentences.kr: 흥미로운 지적이지만, 이런 관찰로 반박하고 싶습니다.
sentences.en: That's an interesting point, but I'd like to counter with this observation.

sentences.kr: 귀하의 관점을 존중하지만, 증거는 그렇지 않다는 것을 시사하는 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: While I respect your perspective, the evidence seems to suggest otherwise.

sentences.kr: 방금 말씀하신 것에 덧붙여서, 이런 관점도 고려해야 한다고 생각합니다.
sentences.en: Building on what you just said, I think we should also consider this angle.

sentences.kr: 죄송하지만 그 논리에 결함이 있다고 생각합니다.
sentences.en: I'm afraid I have to challenge the logic in that argument.

sentences.kr: 맞습니다만, 다른 중요한 측면을 놓치고 있는 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: You're right to a point, but I think we're missing another crucial aspect.
That's exactly the point I was trying to emphasize.

sentences.kr: 실제로는 상황이 훨씬 더 복잡하다고 생각합니다.
sentences.en: I think the situation is actually far more complex than that.

sentences.kr: 잠깐만요, 그 전제부터 다시 검토해봐야 할 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: Hold on, I think we need to reexamine that premise first.
